typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	p_latest_datetime as string ('1900-01-01 00:00:000'),
	p_main_source as string ('ADLS_TMPL_DATASOURCE1'),
	p_cdc_column as string ('CDC_TIMESTAMP')
}
source(output(
		SOURCE1_ID as integer,
		SOURCE2_REF_ID as integer,
		SOURCE3_REF_ID as integer,
		NCHAR_VALUE1 as string,
		NCHAR_VALUE2 as string,
		NUMERIC_VALUE1 as decimal(12,6),
		NUMERIC_VALUE2 as decimal(12,6),
		DATETIME_VALUE1 as timestamp,
		DATETIME_VALUE2 as timestamp,
		CDC_TIMESTAMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MainSource
source(output(
		SOURCE2_ID as integer,
		NCHAR_VALUE1 as string,
		NCHAR_VALUE2 as string,
		NUMERIC_VALUE1 as decimal(18,4),
		NUMERIC_VALUE2 as decimal(18,4),
		DATETIME_VALUE1 as timestamp,
		DATETIME_VALUE2 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SlaveSource2
source(output(
		SOURCE3_ID as integer,
		NCHAR_VALUE1 as string,
		NCHAR_VALUE2 as string,
		NUMERIC_VALUE1 as decimal(12,6),
		NUMERIC_VALUE2 as decimal(12,6),
		DATETIME_VALUE1 as timestamp,
		DATETIME_VALUE2 as timestamp,
		CDC_TIMESTAMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SlaveSource3
MainSource select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			'SRC1_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMain
SlaveSource2 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			'SRC2_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSource2
SlaveSource3 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			'SRC3_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSource3
SelectMain, SelectSource2 join(SRC1_SOURCE2_REF_ID == SRC2_SOURCE2_ID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSource2
JoinSource2, SelectSource3 join(SRC1_SOURCE3_REF_ID == SRC3_SOURCE3_ID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSource3
JoinSource3 derive(DSS_CREATE_TIME = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns sink(truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkStaging
DerivedColumns sink(truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		SRC1_SOURCE1_ID,
		SRC1_SOURCE2_REF_ID,
		SRC1_SOURCE3_REF_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkStagingKey
